Hospitality Talks

AB Ambassadors is a global advisory and asset management firm specializing in the tourism and hospitality sectors. We partner with organizations worldwide to unlock value, improve operational efficiency, and drive sustainable growth.

Our Services

At AB Ambassadors, we bring thoughtful transformation and attention to detail to every engagement — helping hospitality businesses navigate disruption and thrive in a constantly evolving market.

As consumer behaviors shift and industry dynamics accelerate, we support our clients in staying ahead of the curve by:

Developing Strategic Vision
Crafting forward-looking strategies that address market disruption and changing guest expectations

Fostering Innovation Culture
Embedding innovation into your organization to fuel adaptability and long-term growth

Creating Differentiated Offerings
Designing new products, services, and positioning strategies that set your property apart from the competition

By staying on top of the latest trends and cultivating a future-ready mindset, we empower our clients to turn challenges into opportunities — and disruption into advantage.

is a multi-faceted discipline and has become more complicated over the years. Customers are spending less and less time with traditional ad-funded media. Brand storytelling now requires systematic thinking, informed by the right data, to deliver the right messages through the right channels.

Custom Solutions

support to address specific needs. Technology has revolutionized the way people interact with hotels from making reservations to requesting services. To win over customers who have unlimited choices and access to information, world-class experiences are a must to turn people into long-term fans.
